Avior Airlines is an airline based in Barcelona, Anzoátegui, Venezuela. It operates scheduled and charter services within Venezuela and the southern Caribbean out of its base at Generál José Antonio Anzoátegui International Airport. It is currently the largest private capital airline in Venezuela in terms of fleet, destinations and its more than 1800 employees nationally and internationally.

Avior Airlines in Barcelona, Venezuela Address, Phone, Email, Fax, Working hours and Website

Address: Barcelona, Anzoátegui, Venezuela.

Phone: +582814209100

Fax: +582812866728

Email id: reservaciones@avior.com.ve

Avior Airlines Official website: http://www.aviorair.com/

Avior Airlines check In

  • Passengers are can check-in from two hours prior to the departure time of the domestic flights.
  • For international flights, passengers can start checking in three hours before the scheduled departure time of the flight.

Fleet size: 11

  • Boeing 737-200
  • Boeing 737-400

Avior Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Avior Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Avior Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Avior Airlines

  • Women up to 20 weeks’ gestation may travel without a medical certificate.
  • Women between 20 and 28 weeks of gestation require a medical certificate confirming where it is indicated that they are authorized and fit to travel, specifying the expected date of delivery.
  • This medical certificate is mandatory to obtain a boarding pass.
  • Women of 28 or more weeks of gestation will not be able to travel on Avior Airlines.

For more details: https://avior.com.ve/faq

Traveling with Pets in Avior Airlines

  • Avior only allows pets in the cabin on flights to the United States.
  • On all other flights, pets must travel as cargo.

For more details: https://avior.com.ve/faq
